string.text: Doc contacted me and sent to Radar - I'll need to meet some Nomad who will help me disable the Scorcher. But how exactly? Well, there's only one way to find out...

Nomad asked to get his belongings which were stolen by a creepy monster. They are hidden in a small village near the Monolith base which was sometimes used to hide from the Monolithians before they took over. According to my new mate, there's a safe containing the passkey which opens the bunker under the Brain Scorcher; his supplies will help me get into the epicenter of the anomaly, the safe is located inside of which.
It seems like the local Monolith base leader wants to see me... I think it'd be better to follow this guide guy while he's adequate.
One of the fanatics' outpost is under attack by the military, however, I don't think the "enemy of my enemy" thing will work here...
Another Monolith outpost is in danger: some mutants are heading there - and I don't think they just want to give the soldiers a hug. Since I've come this far, I must play it till the end; let's help.

Yeah... despite that Nomad character clearly doesn't look like a human, he still has the human trickery: it appeared that there was no anomaly blocking the way and he just used me like some bellboy. Well thank you, Doc... but screw it. Now I need to find the safe (the combination is 2-1-8), get the passkey and return to the exploiter so he'd activate it by using some magnet.
Alright, now it's finally the time to get to Lab X-10 and disable the Brain Scorcher. As always, I'm strongly risking my life... however, this time I might be able to help all stalkers in the Zone.
The combination opening Nomad's safe is 2-1-8.
